document_data.name: Emmezel Tersku
document_data.mainbody: '''Emmezel Tersku''' was a [[Raumviran]] councilwoman and inhabitant of [[Drubiev]] in the [[Hordelands]] in [[1375 DR]].{{Cite dragon/349/The Horde: Barbarians of the Endless Waste}}
document_data.Activities:
As a member of the [[Council of Five (Drubiev)|Council of Five]] Councilwoman Tersku helped govern the town of Drubiev. She devoted most of her efforts toward ensuring that Drubiev did not try to expand their commercial and cultural influence to the lands around the [[Golden Way]].

Emmezel banished a fanatical priest of [[Kossuth]] who threatened to burn Drubiev to the ground with cleansing fire.
